channel.title: [508] Max cb lvl
channel.description: [center]Can anyone help me change the max cb lvl from a 508 to 138 ?[/center]

item.title: [508] Max cb lvl
item.dc:creator: @chrham2 chrham2
item.description:
@chrham2 wrote:

You have to make Summoning as a combat skill.

Open PlayerUpdateMasks.java
search for:
private void calculateCombat(Player p) {
edit the whole void with;

    private void calculateCombat(Player p) {
        if (p == null) {
            return;
        }
        int attack = p.getLevelForXP(0);
        int defence = p.getLevelForXP(1);
        int strength = p.getLevelForXP(2);
        int hp = p.getLevelForXP(3);
        int prayer = p.getLevelForXP(5);
        int ranged = p.getLevelForXP(4);
        int magic = p.getLevelForXP(6);
	int summon = p.getLevelForXP(24);

p.combatLevel = (int) ((defence + hp + Math.floor(prayer / 2) + Math.ceil((summon / 2) + 1)) * 0.25) +0;
        double melee = (attack + strength) * 0.325; 
        double ranger = Math.floor(ranged * 1.5) * 0.325; 
        double mage = Math.floor(magic * 1.5) * 0.325; 

        if (melee >= ranger && melee >= mage) {
            p.combatLevel += melee;
        } else if (ranger >= melee && ranger >= mage) {
            p.combatLevel += ranger;
        } else if (mage >= melee && mage >= ranger) {
            p.combatLevel += mage;
        }
    }

Read full topic
